item.title: Using ZAP's Encode/Decode/Hash Add-on with CyberChef via Encode/Decode Scripts
item.description: Combine the Encode/Decode/Hash add-on with CyberChef operations in ZAP Encode/Decode Scripts for flexible encoding, decoding, and hashing in your testing workflow.
